description: Marastoon is situated on the outskirts of Kabul, Afghanistan. It is a government-funded institution created to shelter and train homeless people of all ages. Money saved on food donated by the United Nations World Food Program is used to buy equipment for vocational training and supplies for a handicraft co-operative. A film without words.
